original_text: But the Lord hath taken you, and brought you forth out of the iron furnace, even out of Egypt, to be unto him a people of inheritance, as ye are this day.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희를 택하시고 너희를 쇠 풀무불 곧 애굽에서 인도하여 내사 자기 기업의 백성을 삼으신 것이 오늘과 같아도

sentences.original_text: But the Lord hath taken you
and brought you forth out of the iron furnace
to be unto him a people of inheritance
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 기업이 된 백성이 되게 하심이라
